Sentece: A good separation of zimelidine and norzimelidine was obtained following derivatisation of norzimelidine with heptafluorobutyric anhydride, the retention times being 6.16 and 10.35 minutes, respectively.
Title: Pharmacokinetic study of zimelidine using a new GLC method.

Sentece: The mean elimination half-lives of zimelidine and norzimelidine were found to be 15 h and 35 h, respectively, which were longer than the half-lives earlier obtained in younger patients.
